dc:title: The Poet and the Pauper
dc:creator: Dorothy Day
dc:description: Depicts her encounters with W.H. Auden, and expresses her great admiration for him and his poems and also her gratitude for his help.
dc:identifier: Dorothy Day Library on the Web document 140 1975-01-01 James Allaire Creative Commons Non-Commercial Share Alike 3.0 en-US http://www.catholicworker.org/dorothyday
